players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1: The villager Diana was found dead.
Charlie: "Bob, why did you seem nervous during the last game we played together?"
You: "Charlie, why were you so concerned about Bob during the last game?"
Bob: "I was just thinking about how we can work together as a team to make sure no one gets eliminated unnecessarily."
Bob: "Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team. Remember, we all want to win this game."
Charlie: "Bob, your nervous behavior and contradictory statements make me suspicious. I suggest we focus on identifying the mafioso among us."
You: "Bob, I noticed you were worried about Charlie during the last game. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
You killed Diana.
Night 1: The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob, why did you seem nervous during the last game we played together?"
Alice: "Charlie, why were you so concerned about Bob during the last game?"
You: "I was just thinking about how we can work together as a team to make sure no one gets eliminated unnecessarily."
You: "Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team. Remember, we all want to win this game."
Charlie: "Bob, your nervous behavior and contradictory statements make me suspicious. I suggest we focus on identifying the mafioso among us."
Alice: "Bob, I noticed you were worried about Charlie during the last game. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team."
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Day 1: Alice was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1: The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
You: "Bob, why did you seem nervous during the last game we played together?"
Alice: "Charlie, why were you so concerned about Bob during the last game?"
Bob: "I was just thinking about how we can work together as a team to make sure no one gets eliminated unnecessarily."
Bob: "Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team. Remember, we all want to win this game."
You: "Bob, your nervous behavior and contradictory statements make me suspicious. I suggest we focus on identifying the mafioso among us."
Alice: "Bob, I noticed you were worried about Charlie during the last game. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team."
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Day 1: Alice was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the villager.
